whatIsMewDesc1: SmiloWallet is a free, open-source, client-side interface. SmiloWallet allows you to interact directly with the blockchain, while you remain in full control of your keys and funds.
whatIsMewDesc2: Please think about this carefully. YOU are the one who is in control. SmiloWallet is not a bank or exchange. We don't hold your keys, your funds, or your information. This means we can't access accounts, recover keys, reset passwords, or reverse transactions.
whatIsMewWarning: WARNING: You And Only You Are Responsible For Your Security.
whereAreMyFundsDesc: Your tokens and coins are not on SmiloWallet. Just like they aren't on your hardware wallet, on the SmiloWallet-extension, or on blockchain explorers. All funds are on the blockchain itself. This means that we do not control them. We are a doorway that allows you to interact with the blockchain in a convenient way.
whereAreMyFundsWarning: WARNING: SmiloWallet Does Not Control Your Funds. You Do!
whatIsBlockchainDesc1: The term 'blockchain' refers to a public, decentalized spreadsheet, similar to a ledger. It's maintained by people all over the world, who remotely mine transactions to make them a part of the blockchain, permanently.
whatIsBlockchainDesc2: When you use SmiloWallet, you are accessing the blockchain directly. It's your responsibility to take all necessary security precautions when you do this. Please do your research, knowledge is power! (Read on for a link to our Help Center.)

lostPasswordDescOpt1: Write Your Keys And Password Down. Keep Them Safe.
lostPasswordDescOpt2: Don't Store Your Keys And Password on Your Computer or Phone.
tip1Title: Never give your Private Key to anyone
tip1Desc: That includes your keystore file and mnemonic phrase.
tip2Desc: If they're giving away free Smilo, it's not real. If they email you saying they're us, it's not real. If they ask for your private key, it's not real.
tip3Desc: Always check the URL for our SmiloWallet certification. And install our

congratulationsDesc: Thanks for reading through our introduction! Now you're ready to dive in.
whatIsUpsideSubTitle: All this sounds hard. What's the upside?
whatIsUpsideDesc1: The purpose of cryptocurrency is to allow people to manage their funds in a anonymous and secure way, from any location, without relying on third parties.
whatIsUpsideDesc2: On the blockchain, your digital assets are not controlled by any bank or government. You are the only one who has access to your funds and you can instantly transfer them to any other address on the blockchain without depending on authorizations, permissions, or limits.
whatIsUpsideDesc3: Your public address and your private key are the only pieces of information you need to hold and manage your funds from anywhere in the world.
whatIsUpsideWarning: Warning: We Can't Restore Your Keys or Reset Your Password
